评论详情: Super light weight and perfect for a special event or night out. Came in a nice box.  You can either have just the front chain on or keep them both (comes with the plastic tabs so you don't have to use the back piece as the earring back), which is awesome. These are really pretty!
My wife really liked these earrings. They have a beautiful design and are easy to put on and take off. The stones shine well. Beautiful earrings for a party.
